issue.title: [JS] Add declaration maps
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13277](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13277). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Declaration maps link from .d.ts files to source files making it much easier to navigate code from TypeScript projects. We should add declaration maps to our bundles.
